metadata.title: CVE-2016-9918 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: In BlueZ 5.42, an out-of-bounds read was identified in "packet_hexdump"function in "monitor/packet.c" source file. This issue can be triggered byprocessing a corrupted dump file and will result in btmon crash.

criterions.comment: bluez package in esm-infra/bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
